## Project Type
Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for an educational technology platform.

## Platform Name
**Being Iitian** - Premier IIT-JEE Coaching Platform

## Features Implemented
- Custom landing page based on Figma design specifications
- Dark theme hero section with dual login (Student/Mentor)
- Feature section with 4 key offerings
- Premium courses showcase with carousel
- Core team member display section
- Responsive navigation and footer
- Custom color palette matching Figma design
- Complete pages: Home, Courses, About, Contact

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 16 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS 4
- Inter font family
